mapper.select: select u.nickname, count(distinct case when b.status = 0 then b.id end) as auditing_count, count(distinct case when b.status = 1 then b.id end) as pass_count, count(distinct case when b.status = 2 then b.id end) as no_pass_count, count(distinct case when r.type = 0 then r.id end) as up, count(distinct case when r.type = 1 then r.id end) as down, count(distinct case when r.type = 2 then r.id end) as star from user u left join blog b on u.id = b.author_id and b.is_deleted = 0 left join record r on r.user_id = u.id and r.blog_id is not null and r.is_deleted = 0 where u.id = #{id} and u.is_deleted = 0
